title: Stuart Pearce
summary: Stuart Pearce MBE (born 24 April 1962) is an English football manager and former player. He is a first-team coach for Premier League club West Ham United.  Pearce was the manager of the England national under-21 team from 2007 to 2013 and also managed the Great Britain Olympic football team at the 2012 Olympics.[4] He was appointed as caretaker manager of the England national team for one game in February 2012, following the resignation of Fabio Capello and prior  to the appointment of Roy Hodgson.
